DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Criteria Personal Medical History Valvular Stenosis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not patient has medical history of valvular stenosis disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Personal Medical History Valvular Stenosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._Narrowing of the opening of one or more of the four valves of the heart.
